item.description: I am a Senior Data Scientist at idealista/data. Previously, I worked as an Applied Economics researcher in different projects at University of Oviedo. During three of those years my main focus was to write a Ph.D. on Transportation Economics, Spatial Econometrics and Regional Science. In 2015 I left Academia for pursuing a career in Data Science. Firstly, I worked for a small startup in the Telecommunications sector and then moved to a consutancy firm where I succesfully developed a Recommender System for a large retail company. Currently I work for idealista, the leading real estate portal in Southern Europe.
